sentences.en: "Well!", said the innkeeper, drawing herself up indignantly.
sentences.cn: “行！”客栈老板娘挺直身子愤然说道。
一幅坎特伯雷大教堂的素描画

sentences.en: After drawing the curtains, she lit a candle.
sentences.cn: 拉上窗帘后，她点燃了蜡烛。

sentences.en: And all the time next spring's elections are drawing closer.
sentences.cn: 明年春天的选举即将来临。

sentences.en: Choosing the colour for the drawing-room walls was no easy matter.
sentences.cn: 选择客厅墙壁的颜色绝非易事。

sentences.en: Following the performances there were chummy gatherings in the drawing room.
sentences.cn: 表演过后会在客厅举行气氛融洽的聚会。

sentences.en: He is moving ever closer to drawing his pension.
He paused, drawing a deep breath.
sentences.cn: 他停了下来，深深地吸了口气。

sentences.en: I’ve never been very good at drawing.
Man was drawing closer to the stars, opening new worlds.
sentences.cn: 人类在接近各个星球，探索新的天体。

sentences.en: She looked up for a moment, then continued drawing.
sentences.cn: 她抬头看了一下，然后继续画画。

sentences.en: She nodded towards the drawing room. "He's in there."
sentences.cn: 她朝客厅方向扬了扬头说：“他在那里面。”

sentences.en: She was drawing out cash from a cash machine.
sentences.cn: 她正从自动提款机中取钱。

sentences.en: The drawing is transferred onto the wood by means of carbon paper.
sentences.cn: 这幅画是通过复写纸印到木头上的。

sentences.en: The most valuable item on show will be a Picasso drawing.
sentences.cn: 展览会上最贵重的展品是毕加索的一幅素描。

sentences.en: The old drawing room serves her as both sitting room and study.
sentences.cn: 原来那间起居室成了她的客厅兼书房。

sentences.en: We took time to relax in the cosily decorated drawing room.
sentences.cn: 我们在布置得温暖而又舒适的客厅里休息了一会儿。

words.tran_cn: 列车间的挂钩；牵引车的挂钩

phrases.tran_cn: （白昼）渐短；（汽车或火车）到站；[纺]穿经
绘图机；拔丝机；提升绞车
取出；拔长；驶离；拟定（计划）

trans.tran_cn: 素描（画），图画，绘画（艺术），制图（技巧）
trans.tran_en: a picture that you draw with a pencil, pen etc

trans.tran_cn: 画; 移动; 拉，拖; 拔出（draw的现在分词）
